
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18826422" title="发布于 2025-04-15 15:17">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">AI实战：Text_To_SQL+Prompt+数据库(MySQL)+MCP</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1>一、Text-to-SQL应用概述</h1>
<p>什么是Text-to-SQL？Text-to-SQL也称为NL2SQL，是将自然语言查询转换为可在关系数据库上执行的SQL查询的技术。</p>
<p>其核心目标是准确捕捉并反映用户意图，生成相应的SQL查询，确保执行后返回符合预期的结果。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>在前面一篇文章中，链接如下：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18816166" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18816166</a></p>
<p>需要3个文件ddl.txt，description.txt，qa.xlsx才能实现Text-to-SQL。</p>
<p>其中最重要的qa.xlsx，里面的sql就是黄金语句。但是正常情况下，需要准备2000-5000条sql，才能满足需求。</p>
<p>特别的耗时耗力，如果一旦表结构发生更改，就需要重写。</p>
<h1>二、提示工程优化</h1>
<p>为解决这些问题，可考虑采用提示工程（Prompt Engineering）、模型微调（Fine-tuning）、</p>
<p>联合检索增强生成和智能代理（RAG &amp; Agent）等方法，以优化模型及应用的Text-to-SQL任务设计。</p>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>
<p>通过设计特定的提示词或语句，引导模型生成更贴合用户意图的输出内容。在处理SQL查询时，</p>
<p>向模型注入特定领域的知识，如SQL规范、数据库架构以及数据字段注释等额外信息，</p>
<p>能够显著提升模型对于SQL语句结构和逻辑的理解能力。</p>
<p>提示工程的关键在于将自然语言问题与必要的数据库信息转化为适用于大语言模型（LLM）的自然语言序列输入，</p>
<p>即问题表示。同时，当允许输入一些样例以利用LLM的上下文学习能力时，</p>
<p>还需要考虑如何选择样例以及如何将这些样例有机地组织到输入序列中。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>提示工程的关键在于将自然语言问题与必要的数据库信息转化为适用于大语言模型（LLM）的自然语言序列输入，即问题表示。同时，当允许输入一些样例以利用LLM的上下文学习能力时，还需要考虑如何选择样例以及如何将这些样例有机地组织到输入序列中。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>通过构建包含基本提示、文本表示提示、OpenAI范式提示、代码表示提示、指令微调提示以及上下文学习等综合Prompt策略的方法，在Text-to-SQL的Prompt设计中融入说明、数据结构、示例、提示或约束、领域知识及用户问题等要素，能够取得较好的效果，具体如下：</p>
<p>（1）说明：如，“你是一个SQL生成专家。请参考如下的数据表结构，输出SQL语句。”</p>
<p>（2）数据结构：相当于语言翻译中的字典。即需要使用的数据库表结构，把数据结构组装进Prompt，包括表名、列名、列的类型、列的含义、主外键信息。</p>
<p>（3）示例：作为可选项，也是提示工程的常见方式。即指导大模型生成SQL的参考范本。</p>
<p>（4）提示或约束：其他必要的指示。&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>（5）领域知识：可选项，某些特定问题中，对常识描述的解释。</p>
<p>（6）用户问题：用户提出的问题。</p>
<p>融合上述元素，可以得到TEXT-TO-SQL通用Prompt模板框架如下：</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre># 描述Text-to-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">SQL任务的说明
${示例}

# 描述数据库表结构信息
${数据库表结构}

# 相似用户问题及对应的SQL语句</span>/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">[可选]
${示例}

# 用户问题相关的领域知识</span>/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">[可选]
${领域知识}

# 提示或其他约束条件[可选]
${提示</span>/<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">约束}

# 需要生成SQL的用户问题
${用户问题}</span></pre>
</div>
<h2>Agent增强</h2>
<p>AI Agent（智能体）是一种模拟人类或其他智能体行为和决策过程的系统。通过引入行动能力、</p>
<p>长期记忆机制和工具整合能力，能够感知环境、处理信息、制定策略并执行行动来完成任务。</p>
<p>AI Agent通过一个框架规划多个方法，这个框架具有一些具体模块，支持整个结构的运行。</p>
<p>在Text-to-SQL任务中，这通常涉及多个步骤，Agent需要了解这些步骤并提前规划，具体的类型包括：</p>
<p>目标和任务分解：Agent将大型任务分解为更小、更易管理的子目标，以便有效地处理复杂任务。</p>
<p>反思与改进：Agent可以对过去的行为进行自我校准和自我反思，从错误中学习并改进未来步骤，从而提高最终结果的质量。</p>
<p>外部工具与资源利用：Agent可以调用各种外部工具集，如搜索引擎、数据库接口等，以扩展其功能并增强解决问题的能力。</p>
<p>对话管理与上下文保持:通过维护对话历史和关键信息,Agent能够在连续提问或修正查询时保持上下文的连贯性,提升用户体验。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1>三、MySQL数据</h1>
<h2>新建表结构</h2>
<p>本文使用的MySQL数据为8.0.41</p>
<p>新建数据库test</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE DATABASE test CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;</span></pre>
</div>
<p>新建5个表</p>
<p>班级表</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE TABLE `classes` (
  `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` varchar(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">班级ID，示例：202301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `className` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">班级名称，示例：2023级计算机1班</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `grade` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">年级，示例：2023</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `headTeacherId` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">班主任ID，外键(teachers.id)，示例：T003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `classroom` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教室位置，示例：1号楼302</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `studentCount` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学生人数，示例：35</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `remark` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">备注信息，示例：市级优秀班集体</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  PRIMARY KEY (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`),
  KEY `headTeacherId` (`headTeacherId`),
  CONSTRAINT `headTeacherId` FOREIGN KEY (`headTeacherId`) REFERENCES `teachers` (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE</span>=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">班级表</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p>课程表</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE TABLE `courses` (
  `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` varchar(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">课程ID，示例：C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `courseName` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">课程名称，示例：高等数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `credit` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学分，示例：4</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `teacherId` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">授课教师ID，外键(teachers.id)，示例：T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `semester` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学期，格式"YYYY-N"，示例：2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `type` enum(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">课程类型，"必修"或"选修"，示例：选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `prerequisite` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">先修课程ID，可选，外键(courses.id)，示例：C003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  PRIMARY KEY (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`),
  KEY `teacherId` (`teacherId`),
  CONSTRAINT `teacherId` FOREIGN KEY (`teacherId`) REFERENCES `teachers` (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE</span>=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">课程表</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p>成绩表</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE TABLE `scores` (
  `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` varchar(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">成绩记录ID，示例：S20230101C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `studentId` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学生ID，外键(students.id)，示例：S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `courseId` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">课程ID，外键(courses.id)，示例：C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `score` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">综合成绩，0-100，示例：85</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `examDate` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">考试日期，示例：2024-5-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `usualScore` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">平时成绩，0-100，示例：90</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `finalScore` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">期末成绩，0-100，示例：80</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  PRIMARY KEY (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`),
  KEY `studentId` (`studentId`),
  KEY `courseId` (`courseId`),
  CONSTRAINT `courseId` FOREIGN KEY (`courseId`) REFERENCES `courses` (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `studentId` FOREIGN KEY (`studentId`) REFERENCES `students` (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE</span>=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">成绩表</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p>学生表</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE TABLE `students` (
  `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` varchar(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学号，示例：S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `name` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学生姓名，示例：王强</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `gender` enum(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">女</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">性别，"男"或"女"，示例：男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `birthDate` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">出生日期，示例：2005-01-15</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `classId` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">班级ID，外键(classes.id)，示例：202301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `phone` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">联系电话，示例：13812345678</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `email` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">电子邮箱，示例：20230101@school.edu.cn</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `emergencyContact` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">紧急联系人电话，示例：13876543210</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `address` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">家庭住址，示例：北京市海淀区中关村大街1栋101室</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `height` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">身高(cm)，示例：175</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `weight` </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">体重(kg)，示例：65</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `healthStatus` enum(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">良好‌</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">一般‌</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">较差</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">良好‌</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">健康状况，示例：良好</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  PRIMARY KEY (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`),
  KEY `classId` (`classId`),
  CONSTRAINT `classId` FOREIGN KEY (`classId`) REFERENCES `classes` (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE</span>=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">学生表</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p>教师表</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">CREATE TABLE `teachers` (
  `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` varchar(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教师ID，示例：T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `name` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教师姓名，示例：张建国</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `gender` enum(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">女</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">性别，"男"或"女"，示例：男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `subject` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教授科目，示例：数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `title` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">职称，示例：教授</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `phone` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">联系电话，示例：13812345678</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `office` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">办公室位置，示例：博学楼301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `wechat` varchar(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">255</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">微信，示例：lily_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  `isHeadTeacher` enum(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>,<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span> COMMENT <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">是否为班主任，示例：true</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
  PRIMARY KEY (`</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`,`office`) USING BTREE,
  KEY `</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>` (`<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`)
) ENGINE</span>=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教师表</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>;</pre>
</div>
<h2>录入数据</h2>
<p>1. 插入 teachers 表数据</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>INSERT INTO `teachers` (`<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`, `name`, `gender`, `subject`, `title`, `phone`, `office`, `wechat`, `isHeadTeacher`) VALUES
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">张建国</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教授</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345678</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">博学楼301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">lily_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">李明</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">英语</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">副教授</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345679</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">博学楼302</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">tom_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">王芳</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">女</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">物理</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">讲师</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345680</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">博学楼303</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">lucy_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T004</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">赵强</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">化学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">副教授</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345681</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">博学楼304</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">jack_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),

<p>2. 插入 classes 表数据</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">

<p>3. 插入 students 表数据</p>

</div>
<p>4. 插入 courses 表数据</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>INSERT INTO `courses` (`<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`, `courseName`, `credit`, `teacherId`, `semester`, `type`, `prerequisite`) VALUES
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">高等数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">4</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, NULL),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">大学英语</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, NULL),

(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C004</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">大学化学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T004</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, NULL),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">计算机基础</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, NULL),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C006</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">数据结构</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">4</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-2</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C007</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">线性代数</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-2</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C008</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">概率论与数理统计</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">4</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-2</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C009</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">英语口语</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-2</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C010</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">物理实验</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-2</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>);</pre>
</div>
<p>5. 插入 scores 表数据</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>INSERT INTO `scores` (`<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">`, `studentId`, `courseId`, `score`, `examDate`, `usualScore`, `finalScore`) VALUES
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">85</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">90</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">80</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">90</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">85</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">95</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101C005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C005</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">95</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">92</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">98</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),

(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230201C003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230201</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">82</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">80</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">85</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230301C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C002</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">87</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">85</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">90</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),
(</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230301C004</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C004</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">80</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-05-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">78</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">82</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">),

</div>
<h1>四、MCP设置</h1>
<h2>mcp代码</h2>
<p>参考文章：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18822444" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/xiao987334176/p/18822444</a></p>
<p>这里就不重复了，运行python代码即可</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h1>五、Cherry Studio测试</h1>
<h2>mcp设置</h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415150638660-1304737134.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2>&nbsp;创建agent</h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415150754113-80127179.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>名称：test</p>
<p>提示词：</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">使用中文回复。

当用户提问中涉及学生、教师、成绩、班级、课程等实体时，需要使用 MySQL MCP 进行数据查询和操作，表结构说明如下：

# 学生管理系统数据库表结构说明

## </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">. 教师表 (teachers)

</span>| 字段名 | 类型 | 描述 | 约束 | 示例 |
|--------|------|------|------|------|
| <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span> | varchar | 教师ID | 主键 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| name | varchar | 教师姓名 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">张建国</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| gender | enum | 性别 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">女</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| subject | varchar | 教授科目 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| title | varchar | 职称 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">教授</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| phone | varchar | 联系电话 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345678</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| office | varchar | 办公室位置 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">博学楼301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| wechat | varchar | 微信(可选) | 可选 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">lily_teacher</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| isHeadTeacher | enum | 是否为班主任，<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span> | 可选 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>&nbsp;|<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

## </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">. 班级表 (classes)

</span>| 字段名 | 类型 | 描述 | 约束 | 示例 |
|--------|------|------|------|------|
| <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span> | varchar | 班级ID | 主键 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">202301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| className | varchar | 班级名称 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023级计算机1班</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| grade | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 年级 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2023</span> |
| headTeacherId | varchar | 班主任ID | 外键(teachers.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| classroom | varchar | 教室位置 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">1号楼302</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| studentCount | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 学生人数 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">35</span> |
| remark | varchar | 备注信息 | 可选 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">市级优秀班集体</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

## </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">3</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">. 课程表 (courses)

</span>| 字段名 | 类型 | 描述 | 约束 | 示例 |
|--------|------|------|------|------|
| <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span> | varchar | 课程ID | 主键 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| courseName | varchar | 课程名称 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">高等数学</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| credit | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 学分 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">4</span> |
| teacherId | varchar | 授课教师ID | 外键(teachers.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">T001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| semester | varchar | 学期 | 格式<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">YYYY-N</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
|&nbsp;type&nbsp;| enum | 课程类型 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">选修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">必修</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| prerequisite | varchar | 先修课程ID | 可选,外键(courses.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C003</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

## </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">4</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">. 学生表 (students)

</span>| 字段名 | 类型 | 描述 | 约束 | 示例 |
|--------|------|------|------|------|
| <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span> | varchar | 学号 | 主键 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| name | varchar | 学生姓名 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">王强</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| gender | enum | 性别 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">女</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">男</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| birthDate | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span> | 出生日期 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span>(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2005-01-15</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>) |
| enrollmentDate | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span> | 入学日期 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span>(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2023-8-1</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>) |
| classId | varchar | 班级ID | 外键(classes.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">202301</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| phone | varchar | 联系电话 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13812345678</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| email | varchar | 电子邮箱 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">20230101@school.edu.cn</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| emergencyContact | varchar | 紧急联系人电话 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">13876543210</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| address | varchar | 家庭住址 | 必填 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">北京市海淀区中关村大街1栋101室</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| height | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 身高(cm) | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">175</span> |
| weight | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 体重(kg) | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">65</span> |
| healthStatus | enum | 健康状况 | 必填，<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">良好</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">一般‌</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>或<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">较差</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span> |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">良好</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

## </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">5</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">. 成绩表 (scores)

</span>| 字段名 | 类型 | 描述 | 约束 | 示例 |
|--------|------|------|------|------|
| <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span> | varchar | 成绩记录ID | 主键 |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| studentId | varchar | 学生ID | 外键(students.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| courseId | varchar | 课程ID | 外键(courses.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span>) |&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C001</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>&nbsp;|
| score | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 综合成绩 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">100</span> | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">85</span> |
| examDate | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span> | 考试日期 | 必填 | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">date</span>(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">2024-5-20</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>) |
| usualScore | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 平时成绩 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">100</span> | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">90</span> |
| finalScore | <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> | 期末成绩 | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span>-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">100</span> | <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">80</span> |<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

### 补考成绩记录说明
补考记录在_id后添加</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">_M</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>后缀，如<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">S20230101C001_M</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">

## 表关系说明

</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>. **一对多关系**<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 一个班级(classes)对应多个学生(students)
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 一个教师(teachers)可以教授多门课程(courses)
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 一个学生(students)有多条成绩记录(scores)

</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>. **外键约束**<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>- students.classId → classes.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>- courses.teacherId → teachers.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>- scores.studentId → students.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>- scores.courseId → courses.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>- classes.headTeacherId → teachers.<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">id</span></pre>
</div>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>重点就是这段提示词了，这里面详细介绍了每个表、字段解释，表对应关系，一对多，外键约束等等。</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>根据这些，AI模型就可以智能组织sql语句，进行sql查询。</strong></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>效果如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415150821277-1602326189.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;添加到聊天助手</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415150936806-666182123.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2>测试agent</h2>
<p>&nbsp;返回到聊天页面，点击test</p>
<p>开启mcp</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415151048387-95891273.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>选择模型，输入问题，就可以得到答案</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415151013271-1108630420.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>模糊匹配也可以</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1341090/202504/1341090-20250415151618600-830146088.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>从上面2张图，就可以看到，执行了一个多表查询语句，得到了正确的结果。</p>
<p>重点还是提供词提供的比较详细，所以AI模型，能组织正确的sql进行查询。</p>
<p>单表和多表都是可以的。</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
</div>
